channel.title: PLANET NINE - OROS
channel.description:
I’ve been lurking on the forums for a while, but this is my first time posting.
I’ve learned quite a bit just by listening to your work, particularly from @The_Osprey and @Sturge
I’ve also been using an app called Audio Converter, which allows you to convert WAV or MP3 files in FLAC, which can then be imported into AUXY. It’s particularly useful because you can convert directly from a URL or even from another app, I recommend Meme Soundboard for interjections about FLEX TAPE!
Anyway, if you’ve read this far, you can waste another two minutes of your life listening to my track.
OR - Just skip to 1:20, and catch the last 40 seconds or so…
https://soundcloud.com/kv62/planet-9-1
I’d love to know what you guys think. Criticism welcome.
